Package mars.riscv.hardware

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccessNotice
    Object provided to Observers of runtime access to MIPS memory or registers.
    CSRs
    Represents Coprocessor 0.
    FPRegisters
    Represents Coprocessor 1, the Floating Point Unit (FPU) Integrated to RISCV architecture by Maya Peretz in September 2019.
    MemoryConfiguration
    Models the memory configuration for the simulated MIPS machine.
    MemoryConfigurations
    Models the collection of RISCV memory configurations.
    Register
    Abstraction to represent a register of a RISCV Assembler.
    Register.FPRegister
    This subclass represents floating point register.
    RegisterAccessNotice
    Object provided to Observers of runtime access to MIPS register.
    RVIRegisters
    Represents the collection of RISCV's RVI registers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FPRegisters.AccruedExceptionFlagEncoding  
    FPRegisters.fclass  
    Register.FPRegister.Type  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AddressErrorException
    Represents RISCV AddressErrorException.
    FloatingPointException
    Represents RISCV FloatingPointException.
